hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $10+80$ then add $4$ then add $3$.

>$\begin{align}\greenD{14}+\purpleC{83}&=\greenD{10}+\greenD{4}+\purpleC{80}+\purpleC3\\
&= \greenD{10}+\purpleC{80}+\greenD{4}+\purpleC{3}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

Add $14+80$ then add $3$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{14}+\purpleC{83}=&\greenD{14}+(\purpleC{80}+\purpleC{3}) \\
=&(\greenD{14}+\purpleC{80})+\purpleC{3}  \\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $14+83$.**

- Add $10+80$ then add $4$ then add $3$.

- Add $14+80$ then add $3$.

question.content:
**Select any strategy that can be used to add $14+83$.**
